directions: Place the water, pepper, onion, garlic, jalapenos, cilantro, avocado, and tomatillos in a blender, or the bowl of a food processor.  Puree or process to desired consistency, adding more water as needed.  Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 medium fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded, deveined, and finely minced
title: Green Avocado Salsa
